pages.text: $(li)The Smithing Table is an advanced workplace that will allow you to create new items.
$(li)To use it, just place the block and right click on it to open the Smithing Table GUI.
$(li)Now just follow the recipes and insert the needed ingredients to create a new item in the Smithing Table.
